name: Nami

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: Innate:  Nami's  abilities grant a burst of  movement speed to allied champions hit. The bonus is doubled from  Tidal Wave.
passive.description_source:
Tidal Wave uses a separate empowered buff that has priority over the normal buff, and it will be used even if the full/current strength of the empowered buff is weaker than the full-strength normal buff.
If the normal buff remains ongoing when the empowered buff expires, it will then begin with full strength and completely decay over its remaining duration.

basic_ability_1.name: Aqua Prison
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Nami tosses a bubble that lands at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within as well as briefly  revealing and  suspending them.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
The combined time from the start of the cast time to the bubble landing is 0.264 seconds + 0.726 seconds = 0.99 seconds.
Aqua Prison provides the status effect that allows  Last Breath to be cast.[2]

basic_ability_2.name: Ebb and Flow
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Nami unleashes a stream of water onto the target champion or herself, which then bounces to nearby champions up to twice, alternating between enemies and allies and Nami.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
If cast on an enemy with a  spell shield they will not take damage but Ebb and Flow will still continue to bounce, and the target who blocked the ability may be targeted again by the final bounce.
If the target becomes  untargetable,  dies, or is too far away or no longer in  sight during the cast time, this ability will cancel but does not go on  cooldown nor pay its cost (if applicable).

basic_ability_3.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
basic_ability_3.description: Active:  Nami blesses herself or an allied champion for a few seconds, empowering their next three basic attacks or abilities to deal bonus magic damage and briefly  slow enemies.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Tidecaller's Blessing has a  forgiveness radius of 175 units.
The effect will not trigger against structures nor wards.
The empowerment given to allies respects  enchantment redirection.
Damage instances of Tidecaller's Blessing beyond the first do not count as separate applications for the purposes of  Electrocute and  Phase Rush.

ultimate.name: Tidal Wave
ultimate.description:
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.
 Surging Tides will trigger immediately on Nami on-cast.
The wave travels over 3.267 seconds.
